The treatment period consist two-week titration period follow 12-week maintenance period . The study aim determine efficacy , safety tolerability GWP42003-P compare placebo . The High Dose Level recommend Data Safety Monitoring Committee ( DSMC ) assessment safety pharmacokinetic data Part A study GWEP1332 . The Low Dose Level define 50 % High Dose Level . The first subject enroll study DSMC review safety data Part A study GWEP1332 . Following study completion , subject invite continue receive GWP42003-P open label extension ( OLE ) study ( separate protocol ) .
